From: KSLawdogg@...

(Yo, Wolfgang, waiting for Rainchark's response)

Shockwave/Firestarter/Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/
Sun Crusher/Reflector:




Ares looked to Sixshot and then to Rainchark and took a step towards the 
unidentified robot.

"Who are you?" Sixshot yelled angrily.

---

Joining Firestarter on the bridge, Shockwave quickly took a seat in the 
throne/command chair.  "Deploy defenses but wait before using them until we 
have a report from Sixshot and Ares."

"Understood." Firestarter replied, pressing a few buttons to activate light 
outer-security measures.

---

Double Punch and his friends entered the bridge, and began asking questions 
all at once.

---

Sun Crusher and Reflector continued their holographic battle, this time on 
the same side and decimating their enemies.
